info.name: Shipment Backend API
info.description: Unified Postman collection for Shipment Backend APIs: Health, Meta, Modules, Companies, Access Groups, Ports, Cabins, Payload Types, Agents, Users, Currencies, Taxes, Promotions, Partners, B2C Customers, Markup/Discount Rules, Commission Rules, Trips.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Weekend PAX BOGO",
  "description": "Buy 2 get 1 free on weekends",
  "status": "Active",
  "basis": "PERIOD",
  "period": { "startAt": "2025-10-01T00:00:00.000Z", "endAt": "2025-10-31T23:59:59.000Z" },
  "passengerTickets": { "enabled": true, "ruleType": "QUANTITY", "quantityRule": { "buyX": 2, "getY": 1 } },
  "eligibilityConditions": [ { "passengerType": "Adult", "cabinClass": "Economy" } ]
}

{
  "name": "Spend 500 Save 10%",
  "description": "Percentage off for spend threshold",
  "status": "Active",
  "basis": "PERIOD",
  "period": { "startAt": "2025-10-01T00:00:00.000Z", "endAt": "2025-10-31T23:59:59.000Z" },
  "passengerTickets": { "enabled": true, "ruleType": "TOTAL_VALUE", "totalValueRule": { "minAmount": 500, "discount": { "type": "PERCENT", "value": 10 } } },
  "eligibilityConditions": [ { "passengerType": "Adult", "cabinClass": "Business" } ]
}

{
  "name": "Trip Special B2G1",
  "description": "Buy2Get1 on selected trip",
  "status": "Active",
  "basis": "TRIP",
  "tripId": "{{tripId}}",
  "passengerTickets": { "enabled": true, "ruleType": "QUANTITY", "quantityRule": { "buyX": 2, "getY": 1 } },
  "eligibilityConditions": [ { "passengerType": "Adult", "cabinClass": "Economy" } ]
}

{
  "name": "Cargo B2G1",
  "description": "Buy 2 cargo get 1 free",
  "status": "Active",
  "basis": "PERIOD",
  "period": { "startAt": "2025-10-01T00:00:00.000Z", "endAt": "2025-10-31T23:59:59.000Z" },
  "cargoTickets": { "enabled": true, "ruleType": "QUANTITY", "quantityRule": { "buyX": 2, "getY": 1 } },
  "cargoEligibilityConditions": [ { "cargoType": "General Goods" } ]
}

{
  "name": "Vehicle Spend 1000 Save 15%",
  "description": "15% off vehicles over 1000",
  "status": "Active",
  "basis": "PERIOD",
  "period": { "startAt": "2025-10-01T00:00:00.000Z", "endAt": "2025-10-31T23:59:59.000Z" },
  "vehicleTickets": { "enabled": true, "ruleType": "TOTAL_VALUE", "totalValueRule": { "minAmount": 1000, "discount": { "type": "PERCENT", "value": 15 } } },
  "vehicleEligibilityConditions": [ { "vehicleType": "Car" } ]
}

{
  "name": "Marine Transport Co.",
  "phone": "+123456789",
  "address": "123 Ocean St.",
  "layer": "Marine",
  "parentAccount": null,
  "partnerStatus": "Active",
  "priceList": "Standard",
  "creditLimit": {
    "limitAmount": 50000,
    "limitTicket": "CL-001"
  },
  "contactInformation": {
    "name": "John Doe",
    "title": "Operations Manager",
    "phone": "+123456789",
    "email": "john@marine-transport.com",
    "hotline": "+123456700"
  },
  "users": []
}

{
  "ruleName": "Marine Agent Markup",
  "ruleType": "Markup",
  "provider": "{{partnerId}}",
  "appliedToLayer": "Company",
  "partner": "All Child Partners",
  "commissionValue": 5,
  "serviceTypes": ["Passenger", "Cargo", "Vehicle"],
  "passengerCabins": ["Economy", "Business"],
  "passengerTypes": ["Adult", "Child"],
  "cargoTypes": ["General Cargo"],
  "vehicleTypes": ["Car", "Truck"],
  "visaType": "Tourist",
  "routes": [
    { "from": "Muscat", "to": "Dubai" },
    { "from": "Dubai", "to": "Abu Dhabi" }
  ],
  "value": 7,
  "valueType": "PERCENT",
  "effectiveDate": "2025-10-01T00:00:00.000Z",
  "expiryDate": "2025-12-31T23:59:59.000Z",
  "status": "Active"
}

{
  "ruleName": "Company to Marine Commission",
  "provider": "{{partnerId}}",
  "appliedToLayer": "Company",
  "partner": "All Child Partners",
  "commissionValue": 5,
  "serviceTypes": ["Passenger", "Cargo", "Vehicle"],
  "commissionFlow": ["Company", "Marine Agent"],
  "routes": [
    { "from": "Muscat", "to": "Dubai" }
  ],
  "visaType": "Tourist",
  "effectiveDate": "2025-10-01T00:00:00.000Z",
  "expiryDate": "2025-12-31T23:59:59.000Z",
  "status": "Active"
}

{
  "tripName": "Dubai to Muscat Ferry",
  "tripCode": "DXB-MSC-001",
  "vessel": "{{shipId}}",
  "departurePort": "{{portId}}",
  "arrivalPort": "{{portId}}",
  "departureDateTime": "2025-10-28T10:00:00.000Z",
  "arrivalDateTime": "2025-10-28T14:00:00.000Z",
  "status": "Scheduled",
  "bookingOpeningDate": "2025-10-01T00:00:00.000Z",
  "bookingClosingDate": "2025-10-27T23:59:59.000Z",
  "checkInOpeningDate": "2025-10-28T08:00:00.000Z",
  "checkInClosingDate": "2025-10-28T09:30:00.000Z",
  "boardingClosingDate": "2025-10-28T09:45:00.000Z",
  "promotion": null,
  "remarks": "Regular scheduled trip"
}
